response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. This item holds immense worth for us at $1,500,000, reflecting its exceptional quality and rarity. Considering its significance and the benefits it would bring to you, we are offering this opportunity at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. We believe this is a fair and advantageous deal for both parties. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1350000}
